page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE -continued
page.content: During the afternoon we do projects, arts and crafts, music or sport and at 15.30hrs we put our chairs on the tables and go home. After a cup of tea I go outside to play until our evening meal which all the family eat together when my dad gets home. After tea I play or watch television until bed time at about 21.00hrs. I wash my hair every other day because it is 66cms long and I dry it with a hand held hair dryer.I often have a hot drink at bedtime and after a wash and I have cleaned my teeth I read for about half an hour.As I collect soft toys there is not much room for me in bed as I have about 15 of them.
